rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;79828b88.1410">   <title>Bullying Research </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;79828b88.1410</link>   <description> Cyber bullying at work is becoming as common as traditional non-electronic forms of bullying. A recent report, found that one in five employees experience this kind of cyber bullying on a weekly basis, which is similar to figures reported for non-electronic bullying. Social media has also brought with it, bullying through the internet. As although the victim may not see it, their colleagues may, and it can take place online away from the workplace. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-29T10:11:37+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Sam Farley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;79828b88.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;fac5d3cf.1408">   <title>Re: September meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;fac5d3cf.1408</link>   <description> We will rearrange \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd hopefully without much delay. Will be in touch asap.<br><br>Best,<br><br>Mark McGlashan<br>Senior Research Associate<br>Department of Linguistics and English Language<br>Lancaster University<br>Lancaster<br>LA1 4YL    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-21T11:08:40+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>McGlashan, Mark (mcglasha)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;fac5d3cf.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;8d6612c1.1408">   <title>Re: September meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;8d6612c1.1408</link>   <description> Hi Mark<br>Sounds very positive.<br>So, do we need to rearrange a meeting? Or are you saying we don't need one now?<br>Best-<br>Fen<br><br>Letterbox Library<br>a not-for-profit social enterprise<br>Unit 151 Stratford Workshops<br>Burford Road<br>Stratford<br>London<br>E15 2SP<br>Tel: 0208 5347502 / Fax: 0208 555 7880<br>Email: info@letterboxlibrary.com<br><br>Web: www.letterboxlibrary.com<br><br>Subscribe to our newsletter<br><br>----- Original Message -----<br>From: McGlashan, Mark (mcglasha)<br>To: CHALLENGEIT@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Sent: Monday, August 18, 2014 3:08 PM<br>Subject: September meeting [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-21T10:18:20+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Letterbox Library</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;8d6612c1.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;1c876081.1408">   <title>September meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;1c876081.1408</link>   <description> Hi all!<br><br>Hope you’re all well and having at least a bit of a wind down over summer.<br><br>I’d asked following the last meeting about when people would be free and whatnot for a meeting in early september where we’d discuss building a resources pack around our new picturebook. I’d set a date for the 1st of September but, regretfully, I’m going to have to cancel. Just spent 3 months working away and have come back to a pile of work that I just can’t ignore. So, sorry for not being able to hold up my end of the deal. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-18T14:08:23+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>McGlashan, Mark (mcglasha)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;1c876081.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;7b2e7e13.1405">   <title>Re: Homophobic/biphobic/transphobic Bullying project </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;7b2e7e13.1405</link>   <description> This is brilliant news! Will obviously keep you in the loop vis-\ufffd\ufffd-vis newer drafts/edits/publisher progress but, yes, this is fantastic!<br><br>It looks as though 1st sept looks ok for most - getting everyone together might not be a possibility, but if we can get most into a room, that would be great. Tentative: I believe we'll be meeting at Stonewall HQ this time round (Hannah to confirm if ok) and we should make it an afternoon meeting so that there's no rushing around. Just pencil into diaries for now. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-25T15:39:46+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>McGlashan, Mark (mcglasha)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;7b2e7e13.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;2fbbd2ed.1405">   <title>Re: Homophobic/biphobic/transphobic Bullying project </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;2fbbd2ed.1405</link>   <description> Hi Mark,<br>Great news :)<br><br>The Executive Education and Equalities committee met yesterday and really<br>like the draft of the book. As the vast majority of the people around the<br>table were primary teachers they did make comments about the language and<br>its appropriateness for the key stage &quot;too many words&quot;. As others on this<br>forum have done also. They are more than happy to endorse it with their<br>logo, if after the publishers get hold of it they editorialise it<br>appropriately to fit the age range, as they woudl perhaps expect them to.<br>*They would also like to see [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-23T20:12:25+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Annette Pryce</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;2fbbd2ed.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;56f75caf.1405">   <title>Re: Meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;56f75caf.1405</link>   <description> Hi Mark<br><br>I\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdm not sure I will be able to attend the meeting as HMI are normally on a training event on this date. Also, at this stage, I\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdm not sure how useful a contribution I could make as you are aware of the issues surrounding Ofsted not being able to endorse particular resources. That said, I\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdve looked at the book and, personally I think it is delightful, and with quality related teaching resources, I\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdm sure it will be very effective. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-21T18:00:35+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Anne Seneviratne</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;56f75caf.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;4b9142c3.1405">   <title>Re: Meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;4b9142c3.1405</link>   <description> Hi Mark,<br><br>I can definitely do 1 Sept, have put it in the diary.<br><br>Well done on the way the book is progressing - it's coming on so well. Very much looking forward to helping see it through to publication.<br><br>Alex<br><br>Alexandra Strick<br>Manager/Co-Founder, Inclusive Minds<br>Manager/Co-Founder, Outside In World<br>Consultant, Booktrust<br>www.alexandrastrick.co.uk<br>www.inclusiveminds.com - the collective for all those with an interest in children's books and diversity [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-20T22:50:44+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Alexandra Strick (Couchman)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;4b9142c3.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;c23e6d1c.1405">   <title>Re: Meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;c23e6d1c.1405</link>   <description> The 1st is fine for us, Mark.<br>Best- Fen &amp; Kerry<br><br>Letterbox Library<br>a not-for-profit social enterprise<br>Unit 151 Stratford Workshops<br>Burford Road<br>Stratford<br>London<br>E15 2SP<br>Tel: 0208 5347502 / Fax: 0208 555 7880<br>Email: info@letterboxlibrary.com<br><br>Web: www.letterboxlibrary.com<br><br>Subscribe to our newsletter<br><br>----- Original Message -----<br>From: McGlashan, Mark (mcglasha)<br>To: CHALLENGEIT@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Sent: Tuesday, May 20, 2014 4:09 AM<br>Subject: Meeting<br><br>Hello all<br><br>It sounds like end of August/beginning of sept is looking good for most. How would people feel about meeting on sept 1st? [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-20T14:47:05+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Letterbox Library</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;c23e6d1c.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;5d282722.1405">   <title>Re: Meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;5d282722.1405</link>   <description> I am likely to be on annual leave on September 1st as it is still the school holidays.<br><br>Best wishes<br><br>Judy<br><br>From: Challenge It - teaching materials for challenging homophobic bullying [mailto:CHALLENGEIT@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Beth Cox<br>Sent: 20 May 2014 09:50<br>To: CHALLENGEIT@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Re: Meeting<br><br>I'm away from August 28th-Sept 1st (inclusive) and then from Sept 6th for a week or two (at the IBBY congress in Mexico), so I might have to miss out this time. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-20T09:14:29+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Judy Ellerby</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;5d282722.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;955bf83c.1405">   <title>Re: Meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;955bf83c.1405</link>   <description> Hi, yes to the 1st. If it's to be London and you'd like a room, let me know as we can probably host here.<br>Hannah<br><br>From: Challenge It - teaching materials for challenging homophobic bullying [mailto:CHALLENGEIT@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Annette Pryce<br>Sent: 20 May 2014 09:07<br>To: CHALLENGEIT@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Re: Meeting<br><br>Yep 1st is fine, i'll still be in holiday mode though! [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-20T08:54:28+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Hannah Kibirige</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;955bf83c.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;996f41f3.1405">   <title>Re: Meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;996f41f3.1405</link>   <description> I’m away from August 28th\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdSept 1st (inclusive) and then from Sept 6th for a week or two (at the IBBY congress in Mexico), so I might have to miss out this time.<br><br>Beth<br><br>Beth Cox<br>Freelance Editor and Inclusion Consultant<br>Without Exception \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Nothing missed. No one excluded.<br>www.withoutexception.co.uk<br><br>Co-Founder<br>Inclusive Minds \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd the collective for all those with an interest in children's books and diversity.<br>www.inclusiveminds.com [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-20T09:49:40+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Beth Cox</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;996f41f3.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;bf6d0094.1405">   <title>Re: Meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;bf6d0094.1405</link>   <description>Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;bf6d0094.1405">Re: Meeting </a></description>   <dc:date>2014-05-20T09:06:30+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Annette Pryce</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;bf6d0094.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;8f429ba9.1405">   <title>Re: Meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;8f429ba9.1405</link>   <description> Yes I think that's fine. X<br><br>Sent from my iPhone<br><br>On 20 May 2014, at 04:10, &quot;McGlashan, Mark (mcglasha)&quot; &lt;m.mcglashan@LANCASTER.AC.UK&lt;mailto:m.mcglashan@LANCASTER.AC.UK&gt;&gt; wrote:<br><br>Hello all<br><br>It sounds like end of August/beginning of sept is looking good for most. How would people feel about meeting on sept 1st?<br><br>Please reply with a solid yes or an alternative preference so I confirm numbers. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-20T07:29:00+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>John Yates-Harold</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;8f429ba9.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;ddd7328b.1405">   <title>Meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;ddd7328b.1405</link>   <description> Hello all<br><br>It sounds like end of August/beginning of sept is looking good for most. How would people feel about meeting on sept 1st?<br><br>Please reply with a solid yes or an alternative preference so I confirm numbers.<br><br>Best,<br><br>Mark McGlashan<br>Senior Research Associate<br>Department of Linguistics and English Language<br>Lancaster University<br>Lancaster<br>LA1 4YL   </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-20T03:09:25+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>McGlashan, Mark (mcglasha)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;ddd7328b.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;7fd3f201.1405">   <title>Re: Homophobic/biphobic/transphobic Bullying project </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;7fd3f201.1405</link>   <description> Hi Mark,<br><br>Great news that so many publishers are interested. I guess it’s a fine balance now of reminding them you’re waiting without pestering! Alex and I did have a brief chat about this and, in theory, we’re keen to be able to endorse the books. However, as the publisher is liable to change things we’d want to have a look at the final version before 100% confirming. This is more a technicality than anything, as I’m sure you intend to keep some control to ensure that they don’t suddenly make huge changes. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-19T17:44:11+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Beth Cox</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;7fd3f201.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;9d8613a0.1405">   <title>Re: Homophobic/biphobic/transphobic Bullying project </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;9d8613a0.1405</link>   <description>Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;9d8613a0.1405">Re: Homophobic/biphobic/transphobic Bullying project </a></description>   <dc:date>2014-05-19T10:44:03+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Annette Pryce</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;9d8613a0.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;cc88c7e6.1405">   <title>Re: Homophobic/biphobic/transphobic Bullying project </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;cc88c7e6.1405</link>   <description> Mark and all<br><br>Great job, the book is looking great. I can't wait until its published.<br><br>Please can Judy Ellerby be added to the email circulation as she is now covering 'equalities'. I'd like to be kept in the loop for interest and for my Early Years/Primary role.<br><br>Best wishes all.<br><br>Best wishes<br>Rebecca Harvey<br>Interim Principal Officer - Primary [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-19T09:42:38+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Rebecca Harvey</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;cc88c7e6.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;2edb80b.1405">   <title>Re: Homophobic/biphobic/transphobic Bullying project </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;2edb80b.1405</link>   <description> HI Mark<br><br>Didn't know you were off to India! It's a place I'd love to go. Who knows when?<br><br>Anyway, link to FREE materials is http://www.stonewall.org.uk/at_school/education_for_all/quick_links/8634.asp<br><br>See you when you're back. A meet in late August/early September might be good. Hopefully we'll have adopted by then - fingers crossed!<br><br>Much love<br>John Yates-Harold<br>Deputy Head Teacher<br>The Jenny Hammond Primary School<br>Worsley Road<br>Leytonstone<br>London. They’re the next step in editorial and nothing can/will be altered until we’re locked into a deal and there’s a clear editorial plan for the book.<br><br>Publishers seriously showing interest: [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-16T19:32:59+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>McGlashan, Mark (mcglasha)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;5a6c8cdd.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;592dcad1.1405">   <title>Re: Homophobic/biphobic/transphobic Bullying project </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CHALLENGEIT;592dcad1.1405</link>   <description> Hallo!<br><br>Apologies for my EVEN later reply! Work out here has got me pretty tied<br>up, the heat is taking some getting used to, and two super important<br>events in the India have coincided while I\ufffd\ufffdm here: the national elections<br>are being counted today and we\ufffd\ufffdre right in the middle of cricket season.<br>As you can imagine, people are going crazy! And great to see so many of the ideas we all put forward in the last meeting in this final draft.<br>I think the text will still need an editorial hand here and there to direct the text perhaps a little bit more towards the 0-5 age range but I'm sure a publisher will pick this up and will want to work on this title.
